attributes.action: Make Senior Brexiters accountable for Brexit
attributes.additional_details: From Paul Dacre of the Daily Mail and Rupert Murdoch of the Sun pumping out exagerations and lies about the EU, to Nigel Farage and Arron Banks with their dodgy connections to the far-right and Russia, Brexit is a mess of sleaze and corruption, lies and manipulation, incompetence and dereliction of duty. Not only must Brexit be stopped it’s perpetrators must be brought to justice for the damage they stand to inflict on our country either through premeditated malice or sheer incompetence
attributes.background: Senior Brexiters like Michael Gove, Nigel Farage, John Redwood, Jacob Reese Mogg and Bill Cash have been pushing for Brexit for years. In all that time they never bothered to think through or plan how to actually do it without harming our country. Some even stand to gain if it goes badly.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
